original_text: Go to Pharaoh in the morning, as he is going out to the water. Stand on the bank of the Nile to meet him, and take in your hand the staff that turned into a serpent.
korean_text: 아침에 너는 바로에게로 가라 보라 그가 물 있는 곳으로 나오리니 너는 나일 강 가에 서서 그를 맞으며 그 뱀 되었던 지팡이를 손에 잡고

sentences.original_text: Go to Pharaoh in the morning
as he is going out to the water
Stand on the bank of the Nile to meet him
and take in your hand the staff
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 손에 그 지팡이를 가져라
